entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: With the communication antenna reactivated the Corsec personal can now communicate with the outside world.
entries.journal_entry_description: The machinery in the Droid Factory appears to be preventing the Corsec personnel from contacting the Corsec Headquarters in Coronet. In order to re-establish communication you need to activate the local antenna.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: In order to reactivate the antenna you first need to restart the old generators. You can find them just east of the Corsec camp.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: With the generators running you can now re-activate the antenna to the west of the generators.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: With the Antenna re-activated, return to Druno Kener in the Corsec camp.
